results.text_hl: By comparison, there are still clinical perplexities to be addressed in repurposing @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@-driven @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002908 @@@chronic diseases@@@.

results.title: Deciphering the Antifibrotic Property of Metformin
results.text_hl: Overall, these results show that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is a candidate molecule for antifibrotic effect and/or aiming to combat the development of @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002908 @@@chronic@@@ @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory diseases@@@ worldwide.

results.title: The Current and Potential Therapeutic Use of Metformin:The Good Old Drug
results.text_hl: Moreover, it focuses on the potential beneficial effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@ and coexisting @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002908 @@@chronic diseases@@@.

results.title: A geroscience perspective on immune resilience and infectious diseases: a potential case for metformin
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ acts through a few widely accepted cellular and molecular mechanisms that are highly interdependent and implicated @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s downstream effects on immune response, @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002908 @@@chronic diseases@@@, and @DISEASE_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D013577 @@@geriatric syndromes@@@ (Table 1).

results.title: A Clinical Perspective of the Multifaceted Mechanism of Metformin in Diabetes, Infections, Cognitive Dysfunction, and Cancer
results.text_hl: Further research into the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on cognitive function, @DISEASE_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infection@@@ and @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@, especially in people without @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@, will provide new insights into the therapeutic value of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in our pursuit of prevention and treatment of ageing-related as well as acute and @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002908 @@@chronic diseases@@@ beyond @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

results.title: Metformin Therapy Reduces Obesity Indices in Children and Adolescents: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis of Randomized Clinical Trials.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ therapy did not affect lean body mass (LBM) in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Overweight @DISEASE_MESH:D050177 @@@overweight@@@ or @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ and growth problems; however, it reduced LBM in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002908 @@@chronic diseases@@@ (WMD: -1.49 kg; 95% CI: -2.69 to -0.30).

citations.NLM: Sadeghi A, Mousavi SM, Mokhtari T, Parohan M, Milajerdi A. Metformin Therapy Reduces Obesity Indices in Children and Adolescents: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis of Randomized Clinical Trials. Child Obes. 2020 Apr;16(3):174-191. PMID: 32068434

results.title: Metformin: A Potential Treatment for Acne, Hidradenitis Suppurativa and Rosacea
results.text_hl: Considering the anti-androgenic, anti-angiogenic, anti-fibrotic and antioxidant properties of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, it may have the potential to improve @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002908 @@@chronic@@@ @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ @DISEASE_Skin_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D012871 @@@skin diseases@@@.
